hero.title: Holland Veranda
hero.subtitle: Enjoy a luxurious outdoor life – with custom-made verandas from Holland Veranda

custom.title: Custom & Craftsmanship
custom.description: Every veranda or pergola is custom-made by experienced specialists – with attention to detail and finishing.

delivery.title: Quick Delivery & Installation
delivery.description: Delivered and installed within days – neatly mounted by our fixed team. You'll be ready for outdoor living in no time.

materials.title: High-Quality Materials
materials.description: We use only A-grade aluminum and European-made glass – weather-resistant, sturdy, and low-maintenance.

customers.title: Satisfied Customers
customers.description: More than 1500 satisfied customers in the Netherlands, Belgium, and Germany have chosen our verandas and blinds.

modern.title: Modern Veranda
modern.description: Custom modern veranda in Amsterdam with aluminum structure and clean lines. Perfectly suited for modern urban homes.

terrace.title: Terrace Pergola
terrace.description: Modern terrace pergola in Rotterdam with aluminum structure. Perfect for creating an additional outdoor living space.

sliding.title: Sliding Walls
sliding.description: Aluminum sliding wall in Düsseldorf with maximum light intake. Seamless transition between indoor and outdoor.

about.title: About Holland Veranda
about.description: Holland Veranda specializes in aluminum verandas, carports, pergolas, sliding walls, blinds, frames, and custom sun protection. With over 20 years of experience, we provide sustainable outdoor solutions in the Netherlands, Belgium, and Germany.

products.title: Our Products
products.subtitle: Discover our range of high-quality verandas and canopies, perfect for your outdoor space

veranda.title: Veranda
veranda.description: Enhance your living comfort with a stylish custom-made veranda. Extra space and protection against weather.

carport.title: Carport
carport.description: Protect your car from rain and sun with a modern carport. Sleek design and long lifespan.

terrace.title: Terrace Cover
terrace.description: Create additional living space and comfort with a stylish, weather-resistant terrace cover.

frames.title: Window Frames
frames.description: Improve insulation and appearance with high-quality frames. Durable, stylish, and low-maintenance.

sliding.title: Sliding Walls
sliding.description: Let indoor and outdoor spaces flow seamlessly. More light and space with our sliding walls.

sunshade.title: Sun Protection
sunshade.description: Enjoy shade and comfort on your terrace. Stylish protection against heat and UV radiation.

roller.title: Roller Shutters
roller.description: Choose burglar-resistant roller shutters with modern design. Protection and comfort in one.

tiles.title: Ceramic Tiles
tiles.description: Give your terrace or driveway a sustainable upgrade. Wear-resistant, colorfast, and low-maintenance.

modernVeranda.title: Modern Veranda
modernVeranda.description: A modern veranda with clean lines and contemporary design, perfect for modern homes.

classicVeranda.title: Classic Veranda
classicVeranda.description: A classic veranda with elegant and timeless design, ideal for traditional homes.

glassSlidingWalls.title: Glass Sliding Walls
glassSlidingWalls.description: Glass sliding walls that create a seamless transition between indoor and outdoor.

cta.title: Interested in a veranda?
cta.description: Contact us for a no-obligation consultation about the possibilities for your garden.

history.title: Our History
history.description: Holland Veranda was founded in 2000 with the vision to provide high-quality outdoor solutions. Since then, we have grown to become a leader in the industry.

values.title: Our Values
values.description: We believe in quality, innovation, and customer satisfaction. These values guide everything we do.

team.title: Our Team
team.description: Our team of experts is dedicated to providing the best service and products to our customers.

company.title: Holland Veranda
company.description: Your specialist in high-quality outdoor solutions.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: We're here to answer all your questions. Feel free to contact us.

projects.title: Our Projects
projects.description: Discover our recent projects and see how we've helped our customers create their perfect outdoor space.
